author: entertainment.ie
title: Pillo Hotel & Spa Galway
text:
Pillo Hotel & Spa Galway
YOUNG AT HEART: €119pps - 3 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner each evening in either the Point Bar or the Olive Tree Bistro. Includes a €10 voucher to use against any spa treatment valued above €50. All rooms offer air-conditioning and guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi along with use of the fitness suite, spa facilities which include nine treatment rooms and thermal suite.
Spa treatments are available at reduced pricing for guests. Rate based on stay in deluxe room.
This is a midweek offer, valid September 1 to December 1, 2015.
Get Deal
